summary: Gives all the races the Khajiit\'s bonus melee damage.
descriptionHtml:
Just a small tweak, I was annoyed with the fact that I had to play as a Khajiit if I wanted to use unarmed effectively, and decided to give it to all the races. I only tested this with patch 1.6, and 1.7 but it should work with previous ones. Might be in-compatible with mods which alter race\'s starting abilities.

I would recommend the Unarmed Warfare mod to go with this
Unarmed Warfare: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8288
author: Roman200333
